title: Download Problems
body: My LoL download keeps getting to 99% and stops downloading at 275 MB to go. I have repaired the download twice and re downloaded the launcher but it keeps doing it. ideas???

replies.body: its running as administrator but i dont know what OS or ISP is, sorry im not very good with tech :)

OS is operating system. The software on your computer that runs your software. Eg. Windows 8, Mac iOS, Linux Mint, etc.

ISP is Internet Service Provider. It is the company that you pay to give you access to the internet. They are each different in the way they deliver it, so knowing which one you have would be useful.

For future reference, reply using the "Reply" button.

What OS are you on and who's your ISP?

Have you tried running the patcher with heightened privileges?
